description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Uprising is a fast paced top-down shooter that puts the player in control of a sentient AI computer virus that ravages the world in the third millennium. Starting small, the player grows exponentially in power throughout the game. Featuring over 7 unique weapons and 15 levels, this title will keep you gripped until the finish.
